title: Quick Check: Video clip from a 2007 TV series ‘Pandemic’ is being falsely shared as ‘Current position of Italy’
subtitle: The video shared as that of dead bodies being piled up in Italy is not of a real-life incident and is not related to the current COVID-19 outbreak in Italy. It is a clip from a 2007 TV series ‘Pandemic’.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video of dead bodies being piled up in a mass grave is being shared as the current position of Italy. FACTLY has found that the video is not of a true incident and is not related to the current COVID-19 outbreak in Italy. It was taken from 2007 TV series ‘Pandemic’.

Did you watch our new video?
